Name: Charlie
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: A Sweet Manhattan with subtle blackberry and raspberry fruit. Despite the liqueur, this remains spirit-forward and relatively dry.
History: Created in 2009 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London England and named for Charlotte Ashburner, then Chambord liqueur 's UK brand manager.
Nutrition: One serving of Charlie contains 198 calories
